overview: Alfredo is the COO and Co-founder of Uassist.ME, a boutique firm based in Miami Beach, dedicated to providing remote executive assistants, social media management and online marketing support. Winner of the Miami Herald Business Plan Challenge People’s Pick Award (2010), Alfredo is also part-time professor at the School of Economy and Business (ESEN) in El Salvador. In 2010, Alfredo was an honoree of the Miami Power 30 under 30™, a recognition to young professionals who have accomplished much at a young age. Alfredo is also a member of the Junior Board of the Art Museum of El Salvador. In Mid 2012, Inc Magazine featured Alfredo as one of the Top 30 under 30 Coolest Entrepreneurs in America

degrees.subject: Business & Economics
degrees.institution: Escuela Superior de Economia y Negocios
